description: This week, Marketplace Money host Lizzie O'Leary and personal finance expert Farnoosh Torabi discuss her latest book, "When She Makes More," and the rise of female breadwinners in America. Ron Lieber of the New York Times gives advice to parents who have kids heading to college in the fall, but no money to pay for it. Forbes contributor John Wasik tells us about ways to protect yourself from debit card fees. Louis Barajas and Lizzie O'Leary take questions from our listeners and Demetria Lucas tells us about the money lessons she learned growing up.
byline: Candace Manriquez, Lizzie O'Leary, Nick White and Raghu Manavalan

Louis Barajas and Lizzie O'Leary take questions from our listeners and Demetria Lucas tells us about the money lessons she learned growing up.
title: Marketplace Money for Friday, May 02, 2014
